item.name: Rough Mud Crystal
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Rough Mud Crystal requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered near the Glish Ruins.

item.name: Rough Ruby
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Rough Ruby requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be directly obtained from rock containing Gemstones.

item.name: Gem Polisher
item.desc: A material used to change resplendent Gemstones into higher quality Gemstones through Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Alchemy.

item.name: Purified Water
item.desc:
Can be obtained by refining the bottle of water.
- How to Obtain : Filter the bottle of water
※ Using this item on the garden will greatly increase the amount of water deposit.
It can cure sunstroke.
※ The cool-down time is 5 seconds.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
